mapper.select: select * from tbl_member where state = '관리자' or state = '일반회원' limit 6
mapper.update: update tbl_member set me_image = #{me_image} where me_id = #{me_id}
mapper.select: select CONCAT(LEFT(me_email, 3), REPEAT('*', CHAR_LENGTH(me_email) - 3)) AS me_email from tbl_member where me_real_name = #{me_real_name} and me_phone = #{me_phone}
